meta.title: Ogden School District | Home Page

meta.name: description
meta.content: In the Ogden School District, we strive to help students reach their full potential academically and in every way possible. Find resources for students and families in the Ogden area.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Home, Ogden School District Home, Ogden City School District, Ogden, sis, Ogden, ogden, school, ogden school district, jobs, class, link, portal, osd, portal, osd, calendar, google, portal, osd, class portal, class link, student portal
In the Ogden School District, we strive to help students reach their full potential academically and in every way possible. Find resources for students and families in the Ogden area.

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home top-flush bottom-flush fsHasTheme2 district-theme

li.a: Malan's Peak: Youth In Care Program
Teacher Resources for Digital & Distance Learning
Ogden City School District Special Education Board Policy and Procedures
Malan's Peak: Youth In Care Program
Teacher Resources for Digital & Distance Learning
Ogden City School District Special Education Board Policy and Procedures

div.div: Schools Ogden School District is committed to providing safe learning environments that stimulate our students' curiosities, promote continuous improvement, and serve our surrounding communities.

Learning in Ogden We believe that each student has the right to be appropriately challenged through a variety of academic and extra-curricular opportunities, should have access to high quality instruction, and should be supported in their effort to exceed the basic standards.

Community Ogden School District partners with business, community, and parent organizations in furthering and advancing the mission statement of the district. We also promote student participation through community service learning.

img.alt: Weber State University President Wight and volunteers assist students during College Application Week to fill out college and scholarship applications.

div.div: Departments Ogden School District's employees work together to realize the district's vision for student achievement and community development. Our departmental teams call for respect from all individuals for our students, our employees, our learning environment, and our diverse community.

img.alt: East Mountain window view from inside New Bridge School.

div.div: About Us The Ogden School District consists of thirteen neighborhood elementary schools (K-6), three junior high schools(7-9), two comprehensive high schools (10-12), one alternative high school and one youth-in custody school. The district faculty and staff serve approximately 11,500 students and their families. Read More

img.alt: Ben Lomond Bagpipers playing at an event.

div.div: Why Choose Ogden? Ogden School District is on the move to substantial and permanent improvement of student achievement. Our teachers provide high quality instruction. There is an outstanding support structure in place for new teachers as well as veteran teachers seeking to improve the delivery of instruction. Learn More>

div.class: fsElement fsPostElement fsSlideshow fsThumbnailRectangle fsThumbnailLarge fsItemCount_2 fsSlideshowHorizontal

div.a: Board of Education Approves Three Administrative Appointments

div.p: During their April 16, 2020 meeting, the Ogden School District Board of Education approved three administrative appointments including Ogden High School Principal Luke Rasmussen being appointed to Executive Director of Secondary Schools.

article.a: Read More about Board of Education Approves Three Administrative Appointments

div.p:
The Ogden School District is happy to offer multiple programs for the educational betterment of
its students.

article.a: Read More about Advanced Academic Programs for Students
